originalText.text: I received my monkey pox vaccine here, and the people who provided the service couldn't have been nicer or more welcoming. Even though its not a convenient location for me, when the 2nd dose becomes available, I will definitely try and make my appointment for this location.

originalText.text: Well i would like to know why em I band because this is highly unfair and no one still hasn’t responded on what was the Reason that I was band whatever i did my apologies won’t happen again I would like to continue but with a different person because Your coworker I don’t have respect at all and I want to avoid her due to unprofessional work etc. Knowing we know each other outside of profession this wouldn’t be acceptable thanks

originalText.text:
This facility is doing amazing things for the community! They are doing so, in such a major way! I stopped by with coworkers to make a large donation, and they were beyond gracious.

We were able to talk with a lot of the community there, and they sang the praises of the shelter and it’s leadership.

text.text:

We were able to talk with a lot of the community there, and they sang the praises of the shelter and it’s leadership.

originalText.text: Kate Barnhart was the worst experience I ever had. She became hostile towards me when I found a place to live here in new york and was no longer homeless. Under Kate's supervision a lot of my mail came up missing. My mom mailed me money to New alteratives and Kate sent it back to my mom's home address and never told me about it. There was another client named Mr. Lilith under her supervision that came to New Alternatives to eat dinner. Mr. Lilith attacked me in a park and I had problems with Mr. Lilith from a youth drop in center and I filed criminal charges against him and Mr. Lilith had a warrant out. I asked Kate to contact the police because I did not have a phone to contact the police on my own and I told her that Mr. Lilith attacked me and has a warrant out and she lied to me and told me she would contact the police but never did. She made Mr. Lilith leave and only had another staff member escort me to the train station and I could have gotten hurt and she was liable for not contacting the police. I would not recommend that anyone gets their mail from her nor go to her for any services because she was the worst and she does not want to see anyone pull themselves together.

originalText.text: Been with Kate for years has helped me out of binds with my id mire times then i can count wonderful team dinner on Sundays group on Mondays with Charles it's fantastic lgbtq safe place highly recommended
